title: Reactive Messagingâ€‰with AMQP and WildFly
content: In the second article of this series, we will learn how to code, configure and deploy a Reactive Application using WildFly and an AMQP Broker such as Artemis MQ. We will show step-by-step how to set up the environment with Docker and deploy an example application on WildFly. MicroProfile Reactive Messaging with AMQP WildFly supports, ...
